short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Game develop memory and attention, which can be played in offline mode without registration for free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seek out a pair of identical cards. To do this, turn them around by clicking on them with the mouse. Playing the note will require you to a special perseverance and concentration. Mini Games on the development of attention, memory and thinking are ideal for both preschool children and adults.
